scripts.generate: npm run merge && npx prisma format && npx prisma generate --schema=generated/schema.prisma && npm run post-generate
scripts.migrate: npm run merge && npx prisma migrate dev --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset: npm run merge && npx prisma migrate reset --schema=generated/schema.prisma --force
scripts.migrate:deploy: npm run merge && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:status: npm run merge && npx prisma migrate status --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.seed: npm run generate && npx tsx scripts/seed.ts
scripts.studio: npm run merge && npx prisma studio --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.format: npm run merge && npx prisma format --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.validate: npm run merge && npx prisma validate --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.db:push: npm run merge && npx prisma db push --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.db:pull: npm run merge && npx prisma db pull --schema=generated/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset: npm run migrate:reset && npm run seed
scripts.db:setup: npm run generate && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run seed
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run validate:setup
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run validate && npm run validate:setup
